Articles.Content:
I am trying to place objects about a cylindrical body of a rocket. I first use the symmetry option and place, for example, 4 of a certain object about a common axis on the surface. I then want to place a different object on the same surface and using the symmetry option. However, this time I only want 2 of the new object instead of 4.

Unfortunately, there is this automatic setting thing where the system forces me to continue placing 4 of this new object. In other words, whenever I try to switch back to 2, or even some other number like 3 or 5, once I select the desired surface, the game will try to set the number of items back to 4.

This is a really frustrating problem. I wonder if there is an option to turn this annoying thing off, or is this actually a bug?
Which is here, by the way.
It's just a part of the design. You can always put things on one at a time, or the same number as they were placed. Later in production, it may be possible to use more settings in more conditions.
